scripts.test:new_post_file_input: npm test -- post/new.ts -t 'Post new page after sign in set form elements'
scripts.test:edit_post_file_input: npm test -- post/edit.ts -t 'Post edit page after sign in set form elements'
scripts.test:show_post_image: npm test -- post/show.ts -t 'Post show page after sign in display post image'
scripts.test:show_user_post_image: npm test -- user/show.ts -t 'User show page after sign in display post image in user show page'
scripts.test:show_user_like_post_image: npm test -- user/like.ts -t 'User liked posts after sign in display post image in user like page'
scripts.test:create_post_image: npm test -- usecases/create_post.ts -t 'Post create submit success display post index page and dialog message'
scripts.test:update_post_image: npm test -- usecases/update_post.ts -t 'Post update submit success'
